headline.main: Village Police Chief in Spotlight of Ohio's Heroin Battle
headline.print_headline: Village Police Chief in Spotlight of Ohio's Heroin Battle

docs.snippet: The veteran police chief in a bucolic Ohio village, where the last murder was two decades ago and he can just about count the number of drug cases on both hands, finds himself in the spotlight on the front lines against heroin overdoses in one of ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The veteran police chief in a bucolic Ohio village, where the last murder was two decades ago and he can just about count the number of drug cases on both hands, finds himself in the spotlight on the front lines against heroin overdoses in one of the nation's hardest-hit states.

headline.main: Crystal Palace Hit Four Past Struggling Stoke City
headline.print_headline: Crystal Palace Hit Four Past Struggling Stoke City

headline.main: In Florida, a Shifting Cuban Vote Could Be the Difference

headline.main: How AP Rates the Presidential Race and the Road to 270
headline.print_headline: How AP Rates the Presidential Race and the Road to 270

docs.snippet: Despite signs of a tightening national presidential race, Hillary Clinton still appears to have an advantage in enough states to give her an Electoral College victory. It's an edge that could still change as advance voting gets underway in earnest...
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite signs of a tightening national presidential race, Hillary Clinton still appears to have an advantage in enough states to give her an Electoral College victory. It's an edge that could still change as advance voting gets underway in earnest and in the seven weeks until Election Day.

headline.main: At Topshop Unique, an ’80s Supermodel Curl

headline.main: Obama to Meet Israel's Netanyahu Wednesday in New York: White House
headline.print_headline: Obama to Meet Israel's Netanyahu Wednesday in New York: White House

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama will meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday in New York on the margins of the United Nations General Assembly to discuss a recently agreed deal on U.S. military aid, the White House said....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama will meet with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday in New York on the margins of the United Nations General Assembly to discuss a recently agreed deal on U.S. military aid, the White House said.
